) to refer to a field in another schema. Use an unprefixed name to refer to a field in the current or the default schema for the form.

Add handler registration for text input widgets to support e.g. ‘placeholder’ parameter in parameterized widgets [datakurre]

trans-unit.source: Added an option on form to allow display of empty fieldsets. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Добавлена опция на форме,позволяющая отображать пустые наборы полей.[thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: Added the AutoObjectSubForm class to support form hints for object widget subforms. [jcbrand]
trans-unit.target: Добавлен класс AutoObjectSubForm для поддержки подформ форм для подформ виджетов объектов.[jcbrand]

trans-unit.source: Because of the ordering fix the field order in forms may be different. Before this fix the order was a gamble dependent on schema order. Schema form hints
trans-unit.target: В связи с фиксацией заказа заказ поля в формах может отличаться.До этого исправления заказ был азартной игрой,зависящей от порядка следования схем.Подсказки к схемам в формах

trans-unit.source: Behind the scenes: how autoform directives work
By default, fields are included in the form regardless of the user’s permissions. Fields can be protected using the
trans-unit.target: By default, fields are included in the form regardless of the user’s permissions. Fields can be protected using the

trans-unit.target: By loading the schema from a plone.supermodel XML file and using the

trans-unit.source: Changed API methods and arguments to mixedCase to be more consistent with the rest of Zope. This is a non-backwards-compatible change. Our profuse apologies, but it’s now or never. :-/
trans-unit.target: Changed API methods and arguments to mixedCase to be more consistent with the rest of Zope. This is a non-backwards-compatible change. Our profuse apologies, but it’s now or never. :-/

trans-unit.source: Check to make sure that interfaces and field widgets resolved by the supermodel handler are of the correct type. [elro]
trans-unit.target: Проверьте,что интерфейсы и полевые виджеты,разрешаемые обработчиком супермодели,имеют правильный тип.[элро]

trans-unit.source: Contributors please read the document Process for Plone core’s development
trans-unit.target: Авторы, пожалуйста, прочтите документ Процесс разработки ядра Plone

trans-unit.source: Decrease the loglevel of “Field move to non-existing: …” (#21)
trans-unit.target: Decrease the loglevel of “Field move to non-existing: …” (#21)

trans-unit.source: Directives can be specified in the schema to control aspects of form presentation.
trans-unit.target: Директивы могут быть указаны в схеме для контроля аспектов представления формы.

trans-unit.source: Do not omit read-only fields when rendering a form in DISPLAY mode. http://code.google.com/p/dexterity/issues/detail?id=118 [mj]
trans-unit.target: Do not omit read-only fields when rendering a form in DISPLAY mode. http://code.google.com/p/dexterity/issues/detail?id=118 [mj]

trans-unit.source: Enhance the widget directive to allow for specifying widget parameters within the schema. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Расширить директиву виджета,чтобы позволить указывать параметры виджета в схеме.[дависагли]

trans-unit.source: Fields can be grouped into fieldsets, which will be rendered within an HTML
trans-unit.target: Поля могут быть сгруппированы в наборы полей,которые будут отображены в HTML

trans-unit.source: Fieldset labels/descriptions we’re taken from first occurence. It was not possible to override them in a subsequent directive. Also it was not possible to set them in a subsequent directive, if it was not set before. Now subsequent directives w/o a label/description are just adding the field to the fieldset. If a different label and/or description is given, it replaces the existing prior loaded one. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Fieldset labels/descriptions we’re taken from first occurence. It was not possible to override them in a subsequent directive. Also it was not possible to set them in a subsequent directive, if it was not set before. Now subsequent directives w/o a label/description are just adding the field to the fieldset. If a different label and/or description is given, it replaces the existing prior loaded one. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Fix WidgetsView so that _update and update do not clash. [elro]
trans-unit.target: Исправить WidgetsView,чтобы _update и update не конфликтовали.[элро]

trans-unit.source: Fix issue where multiple (plone.supermodel) fieldset directive calls for the same fieldset name resulted to duplicate fieldsets (e.g. when updating fieldset with new fields in a subschema) [datakurre]
trans-unit.target: Устранение проблемы,когда несколько (plone.supermodel)директив набора полей вызывали одно и то же имя набора полей,приводило к дублированию наборов полей (например,при обновлении набора полей новыми полями в абонентской схеме)[datakurre].

trans-unit.source: Fix issue where permission checks were not applied correctly to schemas being added with prefixes. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Исправлена проблема,при которой проверки разрешений не применялись корректно к добавляемым схемам с префиксами.[дависагли]

trans-unit.source: Fix traceback in updateFieldsFromSchemata for forms with no schema. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Исправлена трассировка в updateFieldsFromSchemata для форм без схемы.[дависагли]

trans-unit.source: Fix view.txt doctest to test actual behaviour, not artifacts from test setup. [elro]
trans-unit.target: Исправить view.txt doctest для проверки фактического поведения,а не артефактов из тестовых настроек.[элро]

trans-unit.source: Fixed widget traversal for WidgetsView http://groups.google.com/group/dexterity-development/browse_frm/thread/280016ece3ed1462 [29.08.2010, jbaumann]
trans-unit.target: Fixed widget traversal for WidgetsView http://groups.google.com/group/dexterity-development/browse_frm/thread/280016ece3ed1462 [29.08.2010, jbaumann]

trans-unit.source: For dynamic forms, you could of course make
If you find that you get import errors or unknown keyword arguments in your code, please change names from foo_bar too fooBar, e.g. process_fields() becomes processFields().
trans-unit.target: Если вы обнаружили в своем коде ошибки импорта или неизвестные аргументы ключевых слов,пожалуйста,поменяйте имена с foo_bar на fooBar,например,process_fields()становится processFields().

trans-unit.source: Implementation on how field ordering happens was unreproducible if same schemas are coming in in different orders. New implementation build a well defined rule tree and processes then the field moves, almost independent from the schema order. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Реализация того,как происходит заказ на местах,была непродуктивной,если одни и те же схемы поступали в разных заказах.В новой реализации построено четко определенное дерево правил и процессов,после чего поле перемещается,практически независимо от порядка следования схем.[енсенс]

trans-unit.source: In supermodel XML fieldsets are specified by grouping fields within a
trans-unit.target: В супермодели XML наборы полей задаются путем группировки полей внутри a

trans-unit.source: In supermodel XML the directives are
In supermodel XML the widget is specified using a
trans-unit.target: В супермодели XML виджет задается с помощью параметра

trans-unit.source: In supermodel XML, the directives are called
In supermodel XML, this can be specified as:
trans-unit.target: В супермодели XML это можно указать как:

trans-unit.target: В шаблоне можно использовать следующие переменные:

trans-unit.source: In this case the mode for the
Make field permission checks use the field mode rather than the form mode. Fixes http://code.google.com/p/dexterity/issues/detail?id=110 [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Make field permission checks use the field mode rather than the form mode. Fixes http://code.google.com/p/dexterity/issues/detail?id=110 [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Make it possible to set the ‘omitted’ and ‘mode’ settings only for particular form interfaces. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Make it possible to set the ‘omitted’ and ‘mode’ settings only for particular form interfaces. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Make sure WidgetsView doesn’t use acquisition in Zope 4. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Make sure WidgetsView doesn’t use acquisition in Zope 4. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Minor fixes on testing that could avoid having test isolation problems. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: Незначительные исправления в тестировании,которые могли бы избежать проблем с тестовой изоляцией.[gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Moved form schema directives here from plone.directives.form, and reimplemented them as plone.supermodel directives to avoid depending on grok. Included directives: omitted, no_omit, mode, widget, order_before, order_after, read_permission, write_permission [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Переместили директивы схемы здесь из plone.directives.form,и переделали их в директивы plone.supermodel,чтобы избежать зависимости от грока.Включенные директивы:omitted,no_omit,mode,widget,order_before,order_after,read_permission,write_permission [davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Note in particular that the additional_schemata property is now called additionalSchemata. If you have implemented this property yourself, you will need to rename it! [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Обратите внимание,в частности,что свойство additional_schemata теперь называется additionalSchemata.Если вы реализовали это свойство самостоятельно,вам придется его переименовать! [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Note: In order to be included in the XML representation of a schema, widget parameters must be handled by a WidgetExportImportHandler utility. There is a default one which handles the attributes defined in
trans-unit.target: Примечание:для того,чтобы быть включенным в XML представление схемы,параметры виджета должны обрабатываться утилитой WidgetExportImportHandler.Существует утилита по умолчанию,которая обрабатывает атрибуты,определенные в

trans-unit.source: Properly handle the ‘omitted’ tagged value when it is set to ‘false’ for a field. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Properly handle the ‘omitted’ tagged value when it is set to ‘false’ for a field. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Protect a field with a permission
Raise a NotImplementedError instead of NotImplemented as that is not an exception but meant for comparisons and is not callable. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Поднять NotImplementedError вместо NotImplemented,так как это не исключение,а предназначено для сравнения и не вызывается.[маориты]

trans-unit.source: Reduce field move failure logging from error to warning. Log more information like full rule. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Сократите время регистрации ошибок при перемещении полей с ошибки на предупреждение.Журнал больше информации,как полное правило.[jensens]

trans-unit.source: Remove the dummy security manager on test tear down [ale-rt]
trans-unit.target: Снимите манекен менеджера по безопасности при испытательном сносе [ale-rt].

trans-unit.source: Removed some dead code. Fixes http://code.google.com/p/dexterity/issues/detail?id=132 [optilude, shywolf9982]
trans-unit.target: Removed some dead code. Fixes http://code.google.com/p/dexterity/issues/detail?id=132 [optilude, shywolf9982]

trans-unit.source: Sometimes rather than rendering a form for data entry, you want to display stored values based on the same schema. This can be done using a “display form.” The display form renders each field’s widget in “display mode,” which means that it shows the field value in read-only form rather than as a form input.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes rather than rendering a form for data entry, you want to display stored values based on the same schema. This can be done using a “display form.” The display form renders each field’s widget in “display mode,” which means that it shows the field value in read-only form rather than as a form input.

trans-unit.source: Sources are at the Plone code repository hosted at Github.
trans-unit.target: Sources are at the Plone code repository hosted at Github.

trans-unit.source: Support anonymous schema (dynamic interfaces with and empty __name__ attribute) in autoGroups, opting to use prefix as group name for such cases. This allows subclasses of AutoExtensibleForm to implement getPrefix() method as a sufficient condition to support an unnamed schema. [seanupton]
trans-unit.target: Поддержка анонимной схемы (динамические интерфейсы с атрибутом __name__и пустой __name__)в autoGroups,выбор префикса в качестве имени группы в таких случаях.Это позволяет подклассам AutoExtensibleForm реализовать метод getPrefix()в качестве достаточного условия для поддержки анонимной схемы.[seanupton]

trans-unit.source: Support passing widget classes in the widget directive in addition to IFieldWidgets. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Поддержка передачи классов виджетов в директиве виджетов в дополнение к IFieldWidgets.[дависагли]

trans-unit.source: Support serializing widget parameters to XML. This requires implementing a IWidgetExportImportHandler utility for the widget type. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Поддержка сериализации параметров виджета в XML.Для этого необходимо реализовать утилиту IWidgetExportImportHandler для типа виджета.[дависагли]

Zope schema fields do not allow storing arbitrary key-value data associated with a particular field. However, arbitrary data can be stored in a dictionary on the schema (interface) known as the “tagged values.” This is where
trans-unit.target: Zope schema fields do not allow storing arbitrary key-value data associated with a particular field. However, arbitrary data can be stored in a dictionary on the schema (interface) known as the “tagged values.” This is where

trans-unit.source: builds custom z3c.form forms based on a model (schema) of what fields to include and what widgets and options should be used for each field. This model is defined as a zope.schema-based schema, but additional hints can be supplied to control aspects of form display not normally specified in a Zope schema.
trans-unit.target: builds custom z3c.form forms based on a model (schema) of what fields to include and what widgets and options should be used for each field. This model is defined as a zope.schema-based schema, but additional hints can be supplied to control aspects of form display not normally specified in a Zope schema.

trans-unit.source: directives. The read permission is checked when the field is in display mode, and the write permission is checked when the field is in input mode. The permission should be given with its Zope 3-style name (i.e. cmf.ManagePortal rather than ‘Manage portal’).
trans-unit.target: directives. The read permission is checked when the field is in display mode, and the write permission is checked when the field is in input mode. The permission should be given with its Zope 3-style name (i.e. cmf.ManagePortal rather than ‘Manage portal’).
